english.segment1: The sun still shines ever on the blood stained tracks that delivered death day after day their faces are just like ours how can we be so blind bulldoze bury the evidence die humanity this is more than just a crime against ourselves this is more than just our past (it's our future) ashes to ashes dust to dust kill die humanity man will fail man again and again do you understand in the years before he made a threat warning signs how can we be so blind.
